name: qucat-circuit-generator
description: A project for generating and testing circuits

scripts.copy: cp -r assets dist/assets && cp src/gui/gui.html dist/jscircuit.html && rm -f dist/gui.html
scripts.build: npm run menu:build && npm run bundle && npm run copy && npm run menu:build
scripts.docs:build: npm run docs:clean && npm run build && jsdoc -c docs/jsdoc.conf.json -t node_modules/docdash && cp -r dist docs/dist/app
